user_context.previous_goals_summary: User recently focused on downswing sequencing for 5 days; setup posture work from prior weeks has improved.

setup_posture.feedback: Ball position and stance width are now much improved compared to previous swings.

backswing_mechanics.feedback: Takeaway still relies too much on arms, limiting torso rotation.

downswing_impact.feedback: Early release causes loss of compression and inconsistent strike.

balance_finish.feedback: Finish is stable but weight could move more decisively onto lead side.

consistency_athleticism.feedback: Athletic motion with good intent, but sequencing limits repeatability.

what_was_good: Improved setup compared to earlier swings.
Athletic tempo and commitment through impact.
what_needs_work: Limited torso rotation in the backswing.

primary_focus.reason: This issue has the largest negative impact on strike quality and distance and has not yet stabilized despite prior work.
primary_focus.simple_cue: Keep your wrists hinged longer as your body rotates through the ball.

recommended_drill.name: Pump Drill
recommended_drill.why: Trains proper sequencing and wrist angle retention into impact.

confidence_note: Progress is evident in setup consistency. Addressing early release should unlock cleaner contact quickly.
